value.title: Using Precedence to force Power BI Aggregations
value.excerpt: Are your Power BI Aggregations not matching? Setting Precedence can control which Power BI aggregation will be preferred. A little hint to help it on its way! value.title: Power BI Financial Dashboard: Frequency x Reach x Yield = Revenue (The F.R.Y. approach)
value.excerpt: Let's do something unique for building a Financial Dashboard using Power BI. We would use the F.R.Y. approach (Frequency, Reach, Yield) to analyze our revenue numbers.  You can also use the F.R.Y. approach to analyze any other performance metric. Leave a comment and let me know how it went for you?
